entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 5:00 PM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: N 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18 except 11 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the morning. High 18 except 11 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
